Question
========
Read the following two statements: I) Block randomization is used in between-subjects design to achieve random assignment (random assignment). II) Block randomization is used in within-subjects design as a means of counterbalancing. Which of these statements is TRUE about block randomization? 
Answerlist
----------
* Only statement I.
* Only statement II.
* None of the above statements.
* Both I and II are TRUE.
